properties.name: image-provider.base-url
properties.description: Required: URL of image-provider; target location for webdav image uploads.

properties.name: graphql.endpoint
properties.description: Required: Endpoint of Hasura API; target URL to persist objects.

properties.name: graphql.in-memory-cache-size
properties.description: GraphQL API cache size in MByte.

properties.name: graphql.headers
properties.description: Map of key-value http headers to be passed along with any GraphQL call.

properties.name: scheduler.jobs.enabled
properties.description: Optional: Defines if scheduler jobs should be enabled. Default: false.

properties.name: scheduler.jobs.sync-incremental.cron
properties.description: Optional: CRON job definition for incremental sync.

properties.name: scheduler.jobs.sync-deleted.cron
properties.description: Optional: CRON job definition for scheduler job to sync deleted objects.

properties.name: scheduler.jobs.sync-highlights.cron
properties.description: Optional: CRON job definition for highlights-sync.
